Jordan Casteel (amụrụ n'afọ 1989) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe osise. Casteel na-ese foto nke ndị enyi, ndị hụrụ n'anya, na ndị ezinụlọ ya na ndị agbata obi na ndị ọ na-amaghị na Harlem na New York. Casteel bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na New York City.
A mụrụ Casteel na Denver, Colorado na 1989 na Lauren Young Casteel. Casteel nwèrè ejima na nwanne nwoke tọrọ ya
A gụrụ ya aha Vernon E
Jordan Jr, ónyé nọchiri nna nna ya Whitney Young dị ka onyeisi National Urban League ma bụrụ ezigbo enyi ezinụlọ
Nné nné ya bụ Margaret Buckner Young, ónyé nkụzi na onye edemede akwụkwọ ụmụaka.
Ndị na-ese ihe Romare Bearden, Hale Woodruff, Faith Ringgold, Charles White, na Jacob Lawrence nwèrè mmetụta dị ukwuu mgbè ha na-etolite.
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Yale, Casteel kwagara New York City iji chụsoo ihe osise

Ihe ngosi nké mbụ nke Casteel na New York, nke akpọrọ Visible Man, meghere n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2014 na Sargent's Daughters. Ihe ngosi ahụ gosipụtara ọtụtụ ihe osise buru ibu nke na-egosi ndị ikom ojii gba ọtọ n'ebe dị iche iche n'ụlọ ha niile. Ihe ngosi ahụ nyochara nguzozi n'etiti mmekọahụ na agụụ mmekọahụ, ma na isiokwu ya ma na ndị na-ekiri ya.

A họpụtara Casteel dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na 2015-2016 na The Studio Museum na Harlem, New York, n'akụkụ EJ Hill na Jibade-Khalil Huffman. Ihe omume ahụ na-enye ndị na-ese ihe ohere studio ruo otu afọ, onyinye mkpakọrịta, ụgwọ màkà ihe, na ihe ngosi otu nke gụnyere ndị na-eme ihe nkírí niile bi.
Ya na di ya David Schulze bi na Harlem, ónyé na-ese foto a mụrụ n'Australia nkè ọ zutere na ngwa mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwanyị Raya.
